alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 1:05PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN CARBON AND EASTERN DUCHESNE COUNTIES... At 105 PM MDT...A snow squall was along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Whiterocks to 11 miles northeast of Sunnyside... and moving east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Duchesne, Myton, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Talmage, Cedarview, Utahn, Bridgeland, Upalco, Mountain Home, Arcadia, Neola and Altonah. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 82 and 115. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 58 and 62. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this squall. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this squall. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
